get.description:
Authorization policies to be used for Central NAC.

Authorization policy defines authorization sources and rules that determine the enforcement profile that is assigned to user or device upon authorization.

Authorization policies must be configured with default query parameters.

post.description:
Authorization Policy to be used for Central NAC.

Authorization policy defines authorization sources and rules that determine the enforcement profile that is assigned to user or device upon authorization.

get.description:
Authorization Policy to be used for Central NAC.

Authorization policy defines authorization sources and rules that determine the enforcement profile that is assigned to user or device upon authorization.

patch.description:
Authorization Policy to be used for Central NAC.

Authorization policy defines authorization sources and rules that determine the enforcement profile that is assigned to user or device upon authorization.

delete.description:
Authorization Policy to be used for Central NAC.

Authorization policy defines authorization sources and rules that determine the enforcement profile that is assigned to user or device upon authorization.

delete_object_type.name: object_type
delete_object_type.description: LOCAL - To delete local objects. SHARED - To delete shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

delete_scope_id.name: scope_id
delete_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be deleted. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

delete_persona.name: persona
delete_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be deleted. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

post_object_type.name: object_type
post_object_type.description: LOCAL - To create local objects. SHARED - To create shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

post_scope_id.name: scope_id
post_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be created. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

post_persona.name: persona
post_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be created. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

patch_object_type.name: object_type
patch_object_type.description: LOCAL - To update local objects. SHARED - To update shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

patch_scope_id.name: scope_id
patch_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be updated. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

patch_persona.name: persona
patch_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be updated. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

get_object_type.name: object_type
get_object_type.description: Retrieves LOCAL or SHARED or both(default) configuration objects.

get_scope_id.name: scope_id
get_scope_id.description: Configuration at a given scope. Mandatory for view_type = LOCAL.

get_persona.name: persona
get_persona.description: Filters configuration specific to given persona type. If not provided and view_type = LOCAL, then defaults to all persona.

effective.name: effective
effective.description: True - Returns effective configuration (i.e hierarchically merged configuration). False - Returns committed configuration at a given scope.

detailed.name: detailed
detailed.description: True - Includes annotations in the returned json to indicate the type of object, scope, and persona. False - Returns only config objects without annotations.

view_type.name: view_type
view_type.description: LIBRARY - Returns shared objects in library. For LIBRARY, all other parameters listed below, except 'detailed' , will be ignored. LOCAL - Returns configurations for a scope and one or more persona based on parameters below.

schema.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

schema.description: The UTC date/time at which the current rate limit window resets.

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The UTC date/time at which the current rate limit window resets.

ArubaCdaAuthzPolicy_AuthzPoliciesSchema.description:
Authorization policies to be used for Central NAC.

Authorization policy defines authorization sources and rules that determine the enforcement profile that is assigned to user or device upon authorization.

Authorization policies must be configured with default query parameters.

policy.description:
Authorization Policy to be used for Central NAC.

Authorization policy defines authorization sources and rules that determine the enforcement profile that is assigned to user or device upon authorization.

ANY.description: Any of local or shared config object.

ArubaCdaAuthzPolicy_AuthzPolicyConfig.description: Authorization policy defines authorization sources and rules that determine the enforcement profile that is assigned to user or device upon authorization.

ci-cache-max-age.description: Maximum time in minutes after which cached client attributes are dropped.

position.description: Position determines the order in which the policies are evaluated.

x-enumDescriptions.DEVICE: Client device or MAC based authorization policy.
x-enumDescriptions.CUSTOM:
Custom authorization policy that provides complete flexibility in configuration.
This is only allowed with premium license.

policy-type.x-typeDescription:
Type of Authorization policy that defines the kind of pre-conditions,
identity stores, policy rules and enforcement profiles that can be configured.
policy-type.description:
Authorization policy type that defines the kind of pre-conditions,
identity stores, policy rules and enforcement profiles that can be configured.

items.description: Reference to the identity store(s) to be used for policy evaluation.

default-enf-profile.description:
Default enforcement profile that is inherited by all configured rules.

A union of enforcement attributes from default profile and enforcement profile from matching rule will be applied.

Enforcement Attributes from matching rule have precedence over default attributes

conditions.description: Policy conditions under which the policy or rule can be applied.

x-enumDescriptions.COMB_OP_AND: AND condition for use in Cloud Auth policy rules.
x-enumDescriptions.COMB_OP_OR: OR condition for use in Cloud Auth policy rules.

condition.description: List of policy conditions under which the policy or rule can be applied.

position.description: Position determines the order in which the conditions are evaluated.

x-enumDescriptions.COMB_OP_AND: AND condition for use in Cloud Auth policy rules.
x-enumDescriptions.COMB_OP_OR: OR condition for use in Cloud Auth policy rules.

condition-group-id.description: Unique immutable identifier for condition group.

position.description: Position determines the order in which the condition groups are evaluated.

x-enumDescriptions.OP_EQUALS_IC:
Condition : String equals with case ignored
Example : 'Hello' EQUALS 'HELLO'
x-enumDescriptions.OP_NOT_EQUALS:
Condition: String not equals.
Example: 'Hello' NOT_EQUALS 'World!'
x-enumDescriptions.OP_NOT_EQUALS_IC:
String not equals with case ignored
Example: 'Hello' NOT_EQUALS 'World!'
x-enumDescriptions.OP_GREATER_THAN:
GREATER_THAN operand for use in Cloud Auth policy rules.
eg. 25 > 10
x-enumDescriptions.OP_LESS_THAN:
LESS_THAN operand for use in Cloud Auth policy rules.
eg. 25 < 110
x-enumDescriptions.OP_BELONGS_TO:
String present in a List.
Example: 'v1' BELONGS_TO ['v1', 'v2']
x-enumDescriptions.OP_NOT_BELONGS_TO:
String not present in a List.
Example: 'v3' NOT_BELONGS_TO ['v1', 'v2']
x-enumDescriptions.OP_BEGINS_WITH:
BEGINS_WITH condition for use in Cloud Auth policy rules.
Example: 'Hello' BEGINS_WITH 'Hel'
x-enumDescriptions.OP_BEGINS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE:
String has prefix with case ignored.
Example: 'Hello' BEGINS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE 'heL'
x-enumDescriptions.OP_ENDS_WITH:
ENDS_WITH condition for use in Cloud Auth policy rules.
Example: 'Hello' ENDS_WITH 'llo'
x-enumDescriptions.OP_ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE:
String has suffix with case ignored.
Example: 'Hello' ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE 'LlO'
x-enumDescriptions.OP_CONTAINS:
Condition: String contains a substring.
Example: 'Hello' CONTAINS 'ell'.
x-enumDescriptions.OP_NOT_CONTAINS:
Condition: String not contains a substring.
Example: 'Hello' NOT_CONTAINS 'World!'.
x-enumDescriptions.OP_CONTAINS_ELEM:
Condition: List contains a string.
Example: ['hello', 'world'] CONTAINS_ELEM 'world'
x-enumDescriptions.OP_NOT_CONTAINS_ELEM:
Condition: List not contains a string.
Example: ['hello', 'world'] NOT_CONTAINS_ELEM 'cat'
x-enumDescriptions.OP_CONTAINS_ANY:
Condition: List contains a sublist.
Example: ['a', 'b', 'c'] CONTAINS_ANY ['z', 'c']
x-enumDescriptions.OP_NOT_CONTAINS_ANY:
Condition: List not contains a sublist.
Example: ['a', 'b', 'c'] NOT_CONTAINS_ANY ['z', 'x']
x-enumDescriptions.OP_CONTAINS_ALL:
List contains all elements of another list.
Example: ['a', 'b'] CONTAINS_ALL ['a', 'b']
x-enumDescriptions.OP_CONTAINS_NONE:
List contains none of the elements of another list
Example: ['a', 'b'] CONTAINS_NONE ['a', 'd']
x-enumDescriptions.OP_NOT_CONTAINS_ALL:
List not contains a sublist.
Example: ['a', 'b', 'c'] NOT_CONTAINS_ALL ['a', 'b']
x-enumDescriptions.OP_EXISTS: True if field is present in input.
x-enumDescriptions.OP_NOT_EXISTS: True if field is not present in input.
x-enumDescriptions.OP_IS_MAC_ADDRESS: True if the input is a valid MAC address.
x-enumDescriptions.OP_MATCHES_REGEX: True if the input matches regex.

items.description: list of values for operators associated with list

rule.description:
Policy rule is collection of logical conditions and actions that are evaluated against the configured attributes.

Policy rules are evaluated in the order of their position.

A union of enforcement attributes from the first matching rule and default enforcement profile is applied.

Enforcement Attributes from matching rule have precedence over default attributes.

position.description: Position determines the order in which the rules are evaluated.

profile-id.description: Unique immutable identifier for enforcement profile.

type.x-typeDescription: Specifies the type of enforcement profile.

ArubaCdaEnforcementProfile_AttributeMap.description: List of enforcement attribute key-value pairs.

defined-attr.description: List of pre-defined attribute key-value pairs.

x-enumDescriptions.ATTR_POLICY_ACTION: Policy Action result with possible values of Accept or Reject

custom-attr-name.description: VSA attribute name to be passed to device.

radius-profile.description: RADIUS enforcement profile composed of a list of pre-defined and custom attribute key-value pairs.

Successful200.description: Success response returned from the server.

Error400.description: Error details returned from the server.

message.example: Bad request. Invalid values supplied in request.

Error401.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error403.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error404.description: Error details returned from the server.

message.example: Not found. Yang / Corresponding Rule is missing.

Error406.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error408.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error412.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error429.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error500.description: Error details returned from the server.
